sys_script_email.name: jira_latest_comment_br

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_email_d204d95b1b5f009048a242e58d4bcb9a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>jira_latest_comment_br</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(current, template, email, email_action, event) {

  var comment = getComment(current.getUniqueValue());

  template.print(comment.replace(/\n/gm, '<br style="mso-data-placement:same-cell;">'));

  function getComment(element_id) {
    gs.include('JiraStringUtils');
    var utils = new JiraStringUtils();
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_journal_field');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'comments');
    gr.addQuery('element_id', element_id);
    gr.addQuery('name', 'x_momo_jira_integr_issue');
    gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
    gr.query();

    while (gr.next()) {
      return utils.toPlainText(gr.getValue('value')).getText();
    }
  }
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-07 08:50:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d204d95b1b5f009048a242e58d4bcb9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>jira_latest_comment_br</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="x_momo_jira_integr">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_d204d95b1b5f009048a242e58d4bcb9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-07 08:53:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
